eligibility: Applicants must be U.S. citizens or permanent residents.
Must have completed training in internal medicine, family medicine, med-peds, or infectious diseases by the fellowship start date (July 1, 2025).

requiredDocuments.label: One-page personal statement explaining your interest in the fellowship
Two to three letters of recommendation (one from current program director)

contactInfo.instructions: Submit all application materials by email to Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu. If letters are sent separately by recommenders, please ensure the applicantâ€™s name is included in the email.
contactInfo.generalInquiries: For general questions, contact Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu.
